review_blob: Absolutely horrid. It tastes like watered down instant hot apple cider (the kind that comes from powder) mixed with a little extra artificial cinnamon flavor. You will see that my user name in mixx tail. I created an account on this website specifically to tell you how bad this tastes. The only thing it has going for it is that you cant tell that it is 8% alcohol. Budweiser must have forgotten to put this one through the focus group process.
